entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 16.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
